project1

Class CountDownTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • project1.CountDownTimer

  • public class CountDownTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a timer that counts down until the new year
    Version:
    Winter 2018
    Author:
    AJ Natzic

      CountDownTimer(java.lang.String startTime)
      A constructor that accepts the string startTime as a parameter time in the format "11:30:56" where 11 is hours, 30 is minutes, and 56 is seconds.

      • CountDownTimer

        public CountDownTimer(java.lang.String startTime)
        A constructor that accepts the string startTime as a parameter time in the format "11:30:56" where 11 is hours, 30 is minutes, and 56 is seconds. OR for 11:56 where 11 is minutes and 56 is seconds OR for 22 where 22 is seconds. Many other combinations are also taken into consideration such as strings like "1:1:1" or "3:2"
        Parameters:
        startTime - A parameter for time in the standard colon format stated above
